mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( id, password, name, age, email, height, weight, gender, activity_level, is_diabetes, role, provider, provider_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{email}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{activityLevel}, #{isDiabetes}, #{role}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name as name, age, email, height, weight, gender, activity_level, is_diabetes, role, provider, provider_id, created_at FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
